metadata.purpose: Governs how AI agents document and track the meta-development of the Omega Ecosystem (Constitution, Store, Claw).

meta_dev_mode.core_directive: This file is strictly for collaborative development between the system architect (Eds) and the AI assistant building out the Omega Ecosystem. When the user says "log something" or asks for an evaluation/implementation, the documentation must be written to the active dev directories inside `Omega DEV BUILD/`.

rule.instruction: Do not append to one giant file. Create a new markdown file for every discrete task.
rule.naming_convention: Filenames MUST include the version number and a short description (e.g., `v10.1.0_testing_loop.md`).

rule.instruction: Whenever the user says "log something" or "write a changelog".
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Changle Log/` (e.g., `v10.x.x_feature_update.md`).
rule.content: State the exact version, list the modified files, and describe the feature added or bug fixed.

rule.instruction: When asked to do a "Full Evaluation" of a system or component.
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Evaluations/`.
rule.content: Detail strengths, weaknesses, remaining gaps, and assign an objective score.

rule.instruction: When designing a new feature, architecture, or ecosystem component before execution.
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Implementations/`.
rule.content: Map out the plan, the exact files involved, and dependencies.

rule.instruction: When running tests on a freshly built component.
rule.action: Create a new file in `Omega DEV BUILD/Testing/`.
rule.content: Document test steps, expected outcomes, and actual outcomes.
